original_text: Pharaoh's horses, his chariots and his soldiers went into the sea. Then the Lord made the waters of the sea come back over them. But the Israelites walked through the middle of the sea on dry ground.’ Pharaoh's horses, his chariots and his soldiers went into the sea.
korean_text: 바로의 말과 병거와 마병이 함께 바다에 들어가매 여호와께서 바닷물을 그들 위에 되돌려 흐르게 하셨으나 이스라엘 자손은 바다 가운데서 마른 땅으로 지나간지라

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh's horses went into the sea
his chariots went into the sea
and his soldiers went into the sea
Then the Lord made the waters of the sea come back
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주께서 바닷물이 다시 돌아오게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: through the middle of the sea
